text: Hi all, I am new to HubSpot, trying to learn their CMS, CRM tools etc. so that I can find some client to offer these solutions and make money. If you have any tips/suggestions, I would appreciate it

Hi everyone! I'm new to HubSpot/ website development and am in the (very slow!) process of creating a website for a start-up company.

I've made a few pages to start us off, but I can't seem to fully share them with my team. I sent them links to the pages which we walked through together over Zoom, then when they tried to go back to the links a few days later they were unable to access the pages.

Does anyone know why this is? Do they need to sign up for accounts/ be logged into mine?

Any help would be much appreciated!
Nope didn’t get an answer! I ended up coding it up myself. I’d recommend speaking to <http://Rutterapi.com|Rutterapi.com>, that’s what we are using and it made the connection seamless

If you’re just sharing the preview link - anyone viewing needs to be logged in. However if you’re building the pages in content staging you can just publish the page to content staging and share that link w no problems. 

You can also just publish the page, assuming the site isn’t live yet, and share the actual url. 

If the site already has live pages though I would recommend using content staging.
